timer.title: Timer
timer.ios_warning_message: For the timer to ring on iOS, you must not quit the application or switch off your iPhone screen. Otherwise iOS will prevent the timer from ringing when it reaches zero.

warning.you_cant_add_more_than_x_items: You can't have more than $numberOfItems items in the roulette.
warning.you_must_have_at_least_x_items: You must have at least $numberOfItems items in the roulette.
warning.you_must_enter_an_item_name: You must enter an item name.

error.min_must_be_lower_than_max: The minimum number must be lower than the maximum number.

whiteboard.share_success: Your whiteboard has been shared successfully

networkinfo.title: Network info
networkinfo.location_permission_required:
Location permission is required to get some WiFi info (this is an OS limitation).
You could get incorrect info if you don't grant it.
networkinfo.note_location_permission: Note: some information may be incorrect if you didn't grant precise location permission.

uuidgenerator.default_uuid_text: Press a button to generate a UUID

error.invalid_namespace: The namespace is not a valid UUID

error.please_try_again:
Please try again later.
If it's the first time you're using this language, please wait a few seconds and try again.

nearbypublictransportstops.initial_dialog_message: This tool is intended to be used in Switzerland. It uses the data from "$source"
nearbypublictransportstops.data_license_dialog_message:
The data used in this tool comes from "$source".
$url

error.location_permission_denied: Location permission denied or disabled, please enable it in settings in order to see nearby stops.

error.api_empty_response: The API returned an empty response
error.no_stops_found: No stops found for this search

fileencryption.home_hint: Pick a file to encrypt it. If you want to decrypt a file, pick an encrypted file with the .aes extension

error.failed_to_decrypt_file: Failed to decrypt the file, please check the password

error.failed_to_download: Failed to download thumbnail from YouTube

Please enter a valid YouTube video URL

Examples: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ
https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ

You also need an internet connection to download the thumbnail from YouTube

nationalanthems.license_text: The audio files are provided by "$source" under the $license license

error.failed_to_load_list: Impossible to load the list of anthems. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.failed_to_play_anthem: Impossible to play the anthem. Please check your internet connection and try again.

httprequest.title: HTTP request
httprequest.allow_bad_certificates_description: Enabling this option allows the "HTTP request" tool to send HTTPS requests to servers with invalid, expired or self-signed SSL/TLS certificates. This disables important security controls and may expose your data to interception or tampering by third parties. Only use this function if you fully understand the risks involved, and only when sending requests to servers you trust and control. It is not recommended for general use. Please consider requests made with this option enabled as unencrypted requests (such as HTTP) that can be manipulated and viewed by third parties.

error.timeout:
The request timed out.
Please check your input and your internet connection then try again.
error.other_error:
An error occurred while sending the request.
Please check your input and your internet connection then try again.

morsecode.title: Morse code
morsecode.note_spaces: Note: Use 1 space between letters, 3 spaces between words.

error.location_permission_denied: You need to grant location permissions to use this feature

error.no_alive_cells_description:
There are no alive cells.
Please tap on the grid to add some.

speedometer.title: Speedometer
speedometer.about_traveled_distance_description:
Traveled distance is calculated using the speed detected by the GPS.
This means that the distance is not 100% accurate.
speedometer.change_speed_unit_description: Choose the speed unit you want to use with the speedometer

error.location_permission_denied_description: This tool requires location permission to determine your speed.
error.location_services_disabled_description: This tool requires location services to be enabled to determine your speed.

mc_server_ping.title: MC server ping
mc_server_ping.information_java_description: Check this box if the server is available for the Java Edition of Minecraft. If not, unchecked it and the tool will use the Bedrock Edition API.
mc_server_ping.about_the_api_description: This tool uses the "$source" from "$website" to ping Minecraft servers
mc_server_ping.added_to_favorites_description: The server has been added to your favorites
mc_server_ping.removed_from_favorites_description: The server has been removed from your favorites

mc_server_ping.no_favorites_description: You don't have any favorite servers yet.
mc_server_ping.online_players_description_no_players_to: The server has online players, but no player names are available to show

musicsearch.this_tool_uses_the_x_api:

Use the search bar to find music.

musicanalyser.press_the_button_to_start_music_analysis: Press the button to start music analysis
musicanalyser.this_tool_uses_the_x_api: This tool uses the "$service" API via a Koizeay backend server. "$service" is a registered trademark of "$company" and is not affiliated with this tool.

error.permission_denied_description: The microphone permission is required to analyze music. Please grant the permission and try again.
error.no_match_found_description: No music match was found. Please try again.
error.error_occurred: An error occurred while analyzing the music. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.please_update_the_app_and_try_again: Please update the app and try again. If the problem persists with the latest version, please try again later.

textdifferences.title: Text differences
textdifferences.no_text_hint: Enter text in the fields above to see the differences

characterscopy.title: Characters copy
characterscopy.important_description: Some characters may not be displayed correctly on all devices depending on your operating system. Also, some characters may not be supported by all apps and fonts. Just click on the character you want to copy and it will be copied to your clipboard.

whoisdomain.title: Whois domain
whoisdomain.disclaimer_text: Toolbox provides WHOIS query functionality for informational purposes only. The data retrieved may not be accurate, complete, or up-to-date, and is subject to the terms and conditions of the respective domain registries. Users are prohibited from using WHOIS data for spam, unlawful purposes, or automated data collection. By using this tool, you agree to comply with applicable laws and the registry's terms of service. Toolbox and/or Koizeay assumes no responsibility for errors, omissions, or misuse of the data. Please note that some TLDs may not be supported by this tool.
whoisdomain.ip_address_not_supported_description: This tool only supports domain names, not IP addresses

error.impossible_to_get_whois_information: Impossible to get the whois information, please check your input and your internet connection then try again

credits.title: Credits
credits.app_license: The app is licensed under the $license license
credits.ads_disclaimer: Ads are there to help me pay server costs and support the development of this app.\nOnly a small banner is displayed at the bottom of the screen, nothing to block your Toolbox experience.
credits.made_with_love_in_switzerland_descriptio:
Made in Switzerland, used worldwide.
Thank you for using Toolbox.
If you like it, please consider leaving a review on the Play Store or App Store.
It helps me a lot and motivates me to keep improving the app.
